question: 84 Lumber has personnel who work to set appointments and check inventory levels. What type of person does this for the sales force?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Order getters are responsible for answering phones and taking orders when customers are ready to fill inventory.
That’s not correct. Technical specialists help with specifications and custom fitting products to the needs of the customer.
That’s not correct. Missionary sales professionals are responsible for going out and meeting with customers.
Companies often have support personnel to assist with elements of the sale. This can include checking on inventory and setting appointments for outside sales professionals.

detailedSolution: Companies often have support personnel to assist with elements of the sale. This can include checking on inventory and setting appointments for outside sales professionals.
